remarks: Set of arrows of the category of unital rings (in a universe). (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2020.)
statement:
ringcbas.c $e |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) $.
ringcbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringchomfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
ringchom.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ringchom.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
ringchom $p |- ( ph -> ( X H Y ) = ( X RingHom Y ) ) $.
